item.description:
We're having a Greek Fest at Cavo's...roast lamb on the spit...Greek appetizers...A Greek band playing authentic Greek Music! WOW...what a night...what fun!

Come on out and join us...you can do appetizers, or dinner. I have reserved 12 spots for my fun lovers! It will be a blast...an authentic Greek blast. Sing a little, eat a little, drink a little, maybe dance a little...enjoy life and celebrate friendship.

See you there!!!

BTW... Dinner at 8pm...Music at 9:30pm!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or the Meetup sign...Cell is 203-808-5829

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Greek Night at Cavos...Roast Lamb, Greek Apps, Greek Music!!!
